We were stranded on N90 after a rock slide halted about 40,000 travelers through the tarentaise valley. We were able to turn around and were lucky to book one of the last rooms at this hotel. We were unfamiliar with Annecy as we were traveling from Lyon but it ended up being a wonderful stop in our trip! Special mention to Jose at the front desk who was under an immense amount stress trying to accommodate all lobby full of us and was so incredibly professional and kind. This is a gem of a hotel in a great location!

reviews.review_title: Wonderful hotel from which to explore Annecy.
reviews.positive_text:
The room was exactly as requested (top floor).  It was bright, quiet, fresh and very clean.  Great aircon.  All the room and bathroom facilities were of a high standard and worked well.  The fridge/minibar offered very good choices.  The bed was very comfortable with plenty of pillows!  The wrap around balcony with seating was wonderful night and day for the views.
The buffet breakfast was exceptional and all items replenished speedily.  Very welcoming and helpful breakfast staff.
Special thank you to the Reception Staff who were very friendly and efficient on check in/out and throughout our stay.
This is a wonderful hotel from which to explore Annecy (very central and with private, secure parking) and I can only imagine it would also be wonderful to visit in winter.  Train station a short walk away if required.
reviews.negative_text: Private parking was very convenient but due to the narrow entrance is more suited to small/medium cars.  The Carlton Hotel booking process does make you aware of this though and there are alternative car parks if needed.

reviews.negative_text:
I regret to inform that my stay at this hotel, during what should have been a celebratory honeymoon, was marred by deeply unsettling events. Despite specifically informing the hotel of our special occasion, our privacy was blatantly violated. On two separate nights, an individual from an adjacent room reached out to our balcony attempting to film my wife and me at around 11 PM. Shockingly, when I reported this to the hotel staff, they dismissed my concerns, stating that there was no one in the room next to ours. 

The recurrence of the same invasive behavior the following night led me to request a room change, which felt like an attempt by the hotel to protect or cover up for the intruder, possibly a staff member. Even after taking measures to secure our privacy by closing the window shades, the individual brazenly attempted to extend their arm into our room to continue filming us. 

This experience left us feeling unsafe and unvalued. The hotel's response was wholly inadequate, and it seemed their priority lay elsewhere rather than ensuring the safety and privacy of their guests. I strongly advise against staying at this establishment if privacy and security are of any concern.

reviews.positive_text: Albergo elegante adiacente la stazione di Annecy e pertanto comodo per il treno. Accoglienza traumatica considerato che appena arrivato, dopo un lungo viaggio e con l'auto carica in doppia fila mi ritrovo un'accoglienza gelida in francese stretto, e mi viene subito richiesto, senza indugi, l'immediato pagamento della somma dovuta. Odioso che a pochi chilometri dall'italia questo incomprensibile sciovinismo crei questa dolosa barriera nel linguaggio ancora pi√π incomprensibile per chi in italia ha sempre sperimentata estrema professionalit√† e padronanza delle lingue in alberghi di ben altra qualit√† e ha sempre onorata la sua parcella con calma alla partenza. Credo che per un italiano che voglia viaggiare in Francia dovr√†, suo malgrado, farci l'abitudine a questa odiosa accoglienza, ancor pi√π difficile da comprendere per noi italiani, sempre cosi pronti a comunicare con grande impegno con i turisti francesi o stranieri che vengono a trovarci. Il parcheggio √® decisamente scomodo e male indicato, sito alcuni isolati dopo. La hall dell'albergo spartana e di ridotte dimensioni. La camera piuttosto piccola con i servizi essenziali. La pulizia accettabile non cos√¨ il rapporto qualit√† prezzo che non fa di questo albergo una meta conveniente. Peccato perch√® il centro storico e il parco sul lago sono davvero fantastici.
reviews.negative_text: L'accoglienza e la competenza del personale sono molto carenti e il parcheggio dell'auto molto scomodo. Quanto alle difficolt√† di comunicare abbiamo capito che sotto, sotto, da loro grande soddisfazione.
